tool_description: get a 3 day weather forecast worldwide from weatheronline
name: Weather Forecast Basic
title: Weather Forecast Basic

api_list.name: List of cities in one Country
api_list.description: List of cities in one Country
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://weatheronline-weather-forecast-basic-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api/countrycitylist?COUNTRY={country}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "weatheronline-weather-forecast-basic-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
